AccountPageHeader: Your foundation for building brilliant apps.
AccountPageBody: Emphasizes a smooth, efficient launch for any new project.
VerifySuccessMessage: You've successfully verified your email. You can now log in with your account.
VerifyFailedMessage: Invalid verification. Remember, verification is only valid for one day. Please log in again to reapply.
ForgotPasswordMessage: Enter your email address and we will send you instructions to reset your password.
ResetPasswordMessage: Your password have been changed. You can now login with your new password.
ShouldChangePasswordMessage: For security reasons, you are required to update your password before proceeding.
SendCodeMessage: You should verify yourself to login. Please select a verification type. A code will be sent based on selected verification type.
VerifyCodeMessage: Please enter the verification code sent to you.
QrMessage: Enter the code from  your authenticator app
GuideQrMessage: After you scanned the QR code, the app will generate a six-digit code that you can enter below.
SessionExpiredMessage: Your session has expired. Please log in again to continue.
PleaseEnterNoMoreThanNCharacter: Please enter no more than {{value}} characters
PasswordMismatch: Confirmed Password must be the same as Password
SubscribeTopicMessage: You will now receive notifications from {{value}}
UnsubscribeTopicMessage: You have no longer receive notifications from {{value}}
FileTooLargeDetail: The maximum allowed file size is {{value}}
SecurityDescription: Make sure you can always access your account by keeping this information up to date
AccessDeniedMessage: Sorry, you don't have permission to access this page
PasswordHeadline: Choose a strong password and don’t reuse it for other accounts.
PasswordSubtext: You may be signed out of your account after you change your password.
PasswordStrengthMessage: Use at least 8 characters. Don’t use a password from another site, or something too obvious like your pet's name.
ChangePasswordMessage: Changing password successfully. You may log in with your new password.
2FASubtext: Prevent hackers from accessing your account with an additional layer of security.
SecondStepMessage: Make sure you can access your account by keeping this information up to date and adding more sign-in options
RecoveryEmailMessage: We use your recovery email to contact you if you need help signing in or if we notice suspicious activity.
AuthenticatorMessage: Instead of waiting for text messages, get verification codes from an authenticator app. It works even if your phone is offline.
AuthenticatorFirstStep: First, download Google Authenticator from the <a1>Google Play Store</a1> or the <a2>iOS App Store</a2>.
Turn2FAOnDialogMessage: When signing in you’ll be asked to complete the most secure second step, so make sure this info is always up to date
Turn2FAOffDialogMessage: Turning off 2-Step Verification will remove the extra security on your account.
TapMessage: In the Google Authenticator app tap the
EnterCodeMessage: Enter the 6-digit code you see in the app
RemoveAuthenticatorMessage: To continue to be able to sign in and keep your account secure, make sure you have other sign-in options available before removing this one.
SetUpAuthenticatorSuccess: Authenticator app has been set up
